title: Elite Gourmet ETO-4510M French Door 47.5Qt, 18-Slice Convection Oven 4-Control Knobs, Bake Broil Toast Rotisserie Keep Warm, Includes 2 x 14" Pizza Racks, Stainless Steel
description: Introducing the Elite Gourmet Double Door countertop oven, The perfect stand-in or supplement to conventional ovens. This dual door Rotisserie and convection oven will have you forget about your traditional oven altogether! Toast, bake, broil, and Rotisserie your way to delicious, hearty meals and decadent desserts - this oven can do it all! The spacious interior boasts 4 rack positions so you can bake 2 x 12" Pizzas, warm dinner rolls, and broil a casserole all at the same time! With heating elements on top and bottom that can be independently turned on using the separate temperature dials, a 60-minute timer, and a function dial, This oven really has the versatility you've been waiting for. Includes French-style doors, an interior light, 2 x wire racks, 1 enamel bake tray, a tray handle, Rotisserie set and handle and a crumb tray. Removable parts are all dishwasher safe. Avoid heating up your kitchen with a big conventional oven, save time and use less energy with the Elite Gourmet Double Door countertop oven, The perfect supplement for the holidays when your kitchen needs goes on double duty!
